Ricochet is a surprisingly fun old game. However just like many old games this one is basically dead. In the original CS for example there is still people playing. A lot of people surprisingly. In here there is a handful and thanks to my internet and the servers i can't really connect to any server because of my high ping. Still i was able to play on a server with 2 bots for a while and it is fun. You fly around and throw slow moving discs at people. If the disc hits them they go flying across the map and hopefully falling out of the map. That earns you a point. You can fire 3 of these discs, darts at once. Or you can fire a "charged up" version you can only fire one but if it hits someone it will immediately kill them. So you choose between either firing more discs but taking the risk of the other person just evading, blocking or being hit but getting lucky and not falling off the map you have that option or you can choose the "a single hit is all i need" option in which your fire rate goes down sure but when you get a hit its a confirmed kill no exceptions. Its easy to learn, hard to master. You have to really predict where your target will be by the time the disc reaches them.

+Interesting idea. You don't really use guns or anything. You have floating circles and they have arrows. Once you step on an arrow you are sent flying to another floating area, floating circle. If you move while in the air you might just end up losing all your momentum and falling into the abyss you can collide with other players in the air too. The main weapon is a disc. You have 3 that you can fire in quick succession or you can do a charged up shot which immediately kills whoever it touches but you can only fire one. There are power ups on the map too which can you give special bonuses like when your disc touches someone they freeze and small boosts like that. Some are really OP tho. Still its an interesting game of "guess where your enemy will be and throw this disc accordingly so hopefully you can hit and kill him."
+The game works fine. Like the controls, sounds, graphics they are all fine. Once you really get into it then the game can be really fun. Hitting a target and getting a kill feels really good.

+/-You cannot aim vertically. You wanna shoot something above/below you? Good luck. This is kind of good because it makes the gameplay more interesting and challanging but at the same time getting used to it takes some time. This does kind of become an OP tactic that you can use. You can simply camp a certain place and when the enemy gets near your level just send a charged up shot so you immediately kill them.

-Can't join most servers thanks to my high ping. I literally got kicked out of a few because of it. I guess thats not the games fault but still its an issue for me.
-No players. There is just a really limited amount of players. At least there is AI tho you have to find a server supporting AI.

On its own its not really worth it unless you have a good internet connection and friends to play with. That of course means your friends need good internet connections too and you need to find a server that all of you will be able to connect to and play in. You could probably create your own but i have no clue how and its probably more effort then anyone is willing to put in. Its more effort then i'm willing to put in thats for sure. Either way on its own its not worth it especially with its full price 10,50 TL. That is too much. You're better off buying the Valve Complete Pack which gives you a bunch of cool games along with this one. Its a fun game but with a basically dead player base, high ping and its price its not worth your money. Again either just buy the Valve Complete Pack or get a bunch of friends all with good internet connections and play together. Otherwise stay away.

Developed by Valve and released in 2000, Ricochet was initially sold as a pack-in bonus with updated copies of their debut game Half-Life. While Half-Life was met with relatively lukewarm critical and commercial response, Ricochet was the game that shot Valve into truly being giants in the video game industry, and rightfully so. Ricochet is one of the most important games in gaming history, comparable in its level of influence to legendary games such as Pong, Super Mario Bros., and Plok. Its disc-based multiplayer gameplay sent shockwaves through the industry, but no first-person shooter is yet to capture the magic of the original Ricochet. 22 years later, age has not damaged this game one bit. Ricochet is truly a timeless classic, and despite millions of fans pleading for a sequel to this iconic masterpiece, perhaps this level of perfection simply cannot be topped.

Очень, очень крутая игра. В ней есть различные тактики, фишки, очень годные боты, а так же само комьюнити с которым приятно играть. Довольно однообразный геймплей может затенутся на пару часов! В ней можно сделать очень много разных тактик с помощью разных бонусов которые присутствуют как и на классических, так и на кастомных картах игроков. Единственный минус - это онлайн которого почти нет в данной игре, но это проблему могут быстро исправить боты на серверах которые очень хорошо играют. Я крайне рекомендую вам данный проект. В него будет круто поиграть как и вам самим, как и вашим друзьям.

I am a 45 yo father, probably one of the oldest people playing this game. I am a single father to my Son, who is 14 now. My son got this game for Christmas in 2021 from his uncle, so we installed it on his computer and he started playing. By the end of the week he had 24 hours on this game. This was horrible for me, as it was already hard for me to find ways to spend time with my son, as he is always out with his friends or just watching YouTube. So i decided to make a Steam account and get this game to see if I could maybe play alongside him. I loaded into the game, picked my character and world and started playing but I was stuck on what you where supposed to do. I asked my Son for help and he hosted a game for me to join. I loved it as it was the best time I had spent with my Son since my wife had died. This game has ever since brought me and my son closer again and now we actually spend time together outside the house together as well. This game reminded me that there's fun to be had in everything, and it has brought both me and my Son many happy memories.

[h1]Comentario Analítico: "Ricochet"[/h1]

Uno de los tantos clásicos olvidados de Valve que de algún modo siguen contando con servidores abiertos pero que, aún así, están en su inmensa mayoría vacíos. Encontrar a alguien jugando es una anécdota, ahora mismo SteamDB dice que Ricochet cuenta con 11 jugadores dentro, y al abrirlo pude encontrar un solo servidor con dos personas.

A veces está divertido recordarlo y ponerse a jugarlo con amigos, no obstante es un juego muy básico. No cuenta con la profundidad de otros clásicos, es simple y carente de contenido incluso para la época, volviéndose una experiencia de 20 minutos como mucho. Aún así sus bases son interesantes y se pueden ampliar en algo mucho mejor, lástima que a Valve no le interese hacer nada con esto.

[b]¿En conclusión?[/b] Una compra esencial para los que crecimos con Valve, pero dudo que haya alguien interesado en revisitarlo fuera de ese público.

my life was in shambles before i found ricochet. my kitten left me, and so did my wife. but upon discovering ricochet, i was lifted out of rock bottom and was skyrocketed to the very top. i gained 2 new kittens on discord, and i had become a mod on r/Femboy. more on that, my children started liking me more. ricochet improved my life in every way. but all good things must come to a bitter end. i isolated myself from the larger world, from the 3d people. i only played ricochet, i didnt even open my window. one of my many maids in skimpy dresses came into my room, and i felt repulsed from the vitamin d emanating from the outside world. i beat her over the head with a rock, and i havent seen a regular person since. she's been rotting in my waste basket since then. i just roam the ricochet menus, stalking, looking for a new person to bounce disks with. the only euphoria i derive from life is when i get a decapitation in ricochet. god help us all.

Valve自家游戏中我最后补上的一款，咻，以后再不用因为强迫症去玩Valve这些上古老游戏了。

作为一款多人游戏，服务器一个人都没有，那就等于是不可玩状态。我进去试了几个地图，大致了解了游戏玩法。地图中有几层平台，一踩平台上的箭头就能跳到别的平台上，玩家之间互扔飞盘，打到彼此之后就能把人打出平台摔死。有些平台之间设置了道具可以吃，比如一下子扔三个飞盘的道具，地图边缘还有几处能反射。没了，这么低的竞技和游戏性估计就是没人玩的原因了。

J'adore Ricochet, tellement que au jour de noel ma grand-mère a demandé a mon grand-papa de enlever la carte graphique de mon pc (une carte graphique intel uhd 630 intégrée) pour que j'aille manger la dinde. J'ai tellement jouer au jeu que mes mains sont devenue toutes suante, une chance qui a le savon a main, eau de bain de Gabe Newell et shampoing de Alyx inclus, sinon je senterait comme une merde. J'ai pas pu jouer a Cyberpunk 2077 sur la PS5 que ma mère ma achetée par ce que je jouait trop a ricochet, je me demande c'est quand le Ricochet 2 (Half-Life 3). Des que j'ai joué le lendemain j'avais de l'école et j'ai eu un A+ a place d'un C+ et mon QI a augmenté de 50 (J'ai maitenant 175 de QI) !
